title: SendPANConfig
description: Describes the configuration the send-pan task

provider.description: A provider object to send the PAN response to.  The PAN response will be sent via the same protocol and authentication method to the host configured in the provider.

remoteDir.description: The path in the provider to upload the file to.

panType.description: Specifies which pan type to create: (shortPan, longPan, or longPanAlways). shortPan: Always creates short PANs, longPan: Only creates long PANs when there's more than one granule, else just a short pan, longPanAlways: Always creates long PANs
